title: Some Americans welcome new CDC mask guidance, others wary - Associated Press
content:
1. Some Americans welcome new CDC mask guidance, others wary  Associated Press
  2. When — and where — is it safe to stop wearing a mask? Experts weigh in : Shots - Health News  NPR
  3. Some North Carolina counties can let down the mask, CDC says; see the interactive map  WGHP FOX8 Greensboro
  4. Which St. Louis-area counties are still advised to wear masks by the CDC?  KSDK.com
  5. CDC eases masking for most Americans, minus East TN due to current 'high risk' to hospital capacity  WBIR Channel 10
description: CHICAGO (AP) — Grace Thomas is fully vaccinated against COVID-19 but still not ready to take off her mask, especially around the kids at the home day care she runs in Chicago. But whether the children continue to wear masks remains to be seen after the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced  that healthy people in most areas of the country can safely stop wearing masks as cases continue to fall.
